Thank you for downloading this asset!

We plan on updating it and adding more models to it as soon as possible, any feedback, please contact us!

This package includes:
→ 1 albedo PNG texture, size 2048x2048
→ 95 models with 156,140 tris in total
→ 95 prefabs of each model
→ 1 scene with all the prefabs
→ 2 materials, one for the props and the other for a skybox effect on scene

The pirate items are:
→ 5 anchors
→ 10 barrels
→ 5 opened barrels
→ 1 single cannon ball
→ 2 piles of cannon balls
→ 4 boxes with cannons balls
→ 5 large cannons
→ 5 medium cannons
→ 5 small cannons
→ 1 single gun
→ 4 life buoys
→ 2 money piles
→ 1 oar
→ 7 large pirate ships
→ 8 small pirate ships
→ 1 shotgun
→ 15 steering wheels
→ 8 swords
→ 6 wood boxes

Please, don't forget to rate it :)

Have a nice day from Gameleon Studios!
